scripts.build: npm run build:wc:evfform && npm run build:wc:pdf && npm run build:wc:evfdetails && npm run build:wc:create:no-deps && npm run build:wc:list && npm run build:wc:details:no-deps
scripts.build:wc:details: npm run build:wc:evfdetails && npm run build:wc:pdf && npm run build:wc:details:no-deps
scripts.build:wc:details:no-deps: ng build wc-prescription-details --configuration production --output-hashing none && vite build --mode production -c ./wc-prescription-details/vite.config.mjs && rm -rf ./dist/wc-prescription-details/browser
scripts.serve:wc:details: npm run build:wc:evfdetails && npm run build:wc:pdf && ng serve wc-prescription-details
scripts.build:wc:list: ng build wc-list-prescriptions --configuration production --output-hashing none && vite build --mode production -c ./wc-list-prescriptions/vite.config.mjs && rm -rf ./dist/wc-list-prescriptions/browser
scripts.build:wc:create: npm run build:wc:evfform && npm run build:wc:create:no-deps
scripts.build:wc:create:no-deps: ng build wc-create-prescription --configuration production --output-hashing none && vite build --mode production -c ./wc-create-prescription/vite.config.mjs && rm -rf ./dist/wc-create-prescription/browser
scripts.serve:wc:create: npm run build:wc:evfform && ng serve wc-create-prescription
scripts.build:wc:evfdetails: ng build wc-evf-form-details --configuration production --output-hashing none && vite build --mode production -c ./wc-evf-form-details/vite.config.mjs
scripts.build:wc:pdf: ng build wc-pdfmake --configuration production --output-hashing none && vite build --mode production -c ./wc-pdfmake/vite.config.mjs
scripts.build:wc:evfform: ng build wc-evf-form --configuration production --output-hashing none && vite build --mode production -c ./wc-evf-form/vite.config.mjs
scripts.test: npm run test:wc:details && npm run test:wc:create && npm run test:wc:list && npm run test:wc:reuse
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:wc:details && npm run test:wc:create && npm run test:wc:list && npm run test:wc:reuse && npm run merge:coverage && npm run merge:report
